dont rage please.. respect us and thank you

Post your chat logs. 

We can help you analyze them and show you where you went wrong and possibly correct your misunderstanding of what Riot deems toxic. Most of the time, people look at their chat logs and think their behavior is perfectly acceptable, however, Riot does not and if you can't see it, we can help you see it.

So, if you want help in reforming, post your chat logs. If not, then best of luck in your gaming endeavors.
FYI, GIVE ME ALL MY MONEY BACK
This is a community board. I think you're looking for [Riot support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Well for starters there is no refunds(Possibly in special situations) 

Also, what type of ban did you get?

There is a 4 step process 10 games - 25 games, 2 weeks, and Perma Ban depending on the severity it can skip tiers of punishment.

If you want to appeal your ban, send in a support ticket through the support tab. You will get a response eventually. 

If you act the way you are behaving on the boards, don't expect much.
